titleStmt.title: A continuance of Albions England: by the first author. VV.VV.
Albions England. Book 14-16
titleStmt.author: Warner, William, 1558?-1609.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Felix Kyngston [and Richard Bradock?] for George Potter, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Bible,

notesStmt.note: Richard Bradock may have printed quire B (STC).
The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A.j.".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Bible
